name: Retro Vibes
description:
Retro Vibes

Try to get the highest score and achieve an S or SS rank in all five tracks!

Top down retro-styled arcade shooter inspired by rhythm games like Beat Saber and Osu! with gameplay inspired by Nier:Automata's hacking minigame.

This game was made for a 1 week game jam with the theme of "Audio".
